source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.
source_objects.title: Creativity

items.title: Novel Writing: Dialogue, Beginnings and Endings
items.headline: Bring Your Novel to Life with Vivid Dialogue, Catchy Beginnings and Memorable Endings
objectives_summary: Invent realistic dialogue that propels your characters into conflict and reveals their emotions
Hook your readers with a killer beginning
Drive home your theme with an ending that resonates

items.title: Discover Your Creative Process
items.headline: Learn To Make Your Best Work And Become Who You Are In The Process
objectives_summary: See yourself as an artist and discover renewable ways to create good work for the sake of others.

items.headline: From Euroscript - the first and still the best for screenwriters
objectives_summary: write your very first screenplay
write in correct screenplay format using free formatting software
speak the 'lingo' of the craft

items.title: Traveler's Sketchbook 4: Adding Watercolors to Your Sketches
items.headline: Create and paint a thematic series of sketches while traveling with Santa Fe, New Mexico as the featured location.
objectives_summary: Create and paint a thematic series of sketches that represents a place you have traveled to using photographs or sketching live.
Create finished sketches with ink pens that come to life when watercolor is applied.
This course is a two for one since it includes sketching and beginning watercolor lectures.

items.title: The Rebel Memoir
items.headline: Creating Your First Memoir - Motivation, Inspiration, Craft.
objectives_summary: •	How to move on from a place of fear that is stopping you from moving forward with the story you really want to write.
•	How to cultivate a memoir that reaches a wide audience.
•	How to build a community around you that will lead you to a successful writing career path.

How to write like a full-time writer

Understand the creative process
Learn about how to build the characters in your book

objectives_summary: Develop A Unique Creative Personality Of Your Own
Discover The Nine Most Important Personality Traits Of Creative People
Learn To Become More Curious, Imaginative, Open Minded, Energetic, Intuitive and sensitive In Your Creative Approach

items.title: How To Write & Sell Your First Novel

visible_instructors.job_title: Freelance Writer, Educator, and Bestselling Author
visible_instructors.title: Rob Parnell
visible_instructors.name: Rob

items.headline: Gain the Mindset, Prestige and the Satisfaction of Being a Modern Author
objectives_summary: How to write and sell your first novel within the shortest possible time, no prior experience ncessary!
Be taught by a multi-published author who has been teaching writing successfully for over twenty years.
How to get inspired, organize your ideas, and create an excellent plot for your novel.

items.title: Novelizations: How to Adapt a Screenplay Into a Novel
items.headline: How Screenwriters Can Get Their Stories Into the World Without Waiting on Hollywood to Produce Their Screenplays
objectives_summary: Learn how to adapt your screenplays into novels
Understand the differences between screenplay writing vs. writing novel prose
Understand why a screenwriter may want to get into this business to bring awareness to their stories, while they wait for their scripts to be produced

items.title: Directors Working with Actors

items.headline: Learn how to expertly work with actors from casting sessions to blocking the scene and giving feedback.
objectives_summary: Learn how to direct actors to get the best out of them.
You’ll learn about the directors role and you’ll see Adrian putting this into practice.
You’ll learn how to analyse a script.
